about_the_game:

[GAME NOW CLOSED, WE NOT SUPPORT STEAM VERSION NOW, ONLY MOBILE VERSION]

There are no rules - only the need to win, you can create any chaos.

* Online Mode - play with your friends
* Open world - mean full open, explore it
* Over 30 different cars - available
* Many racing with weapons
* Bonuses - rockets, mines, bullet
* Different weather conditions
* Advanced Car destruction
* Angry bots
* Crazzy Russian cars

game still in development! New features coming soon

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, Linux Mint 11
  • Processor: 2 Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600, Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10, Linux Mint 18
  • Processor: 4 Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7
  • Processor: 2 Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600, Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Work even on MacBook Air
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: 4 Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2 Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600, Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
